results.title: Ask an Australian about surfing [Greek version]
results.creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf live-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Greek.
results.description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf live-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Greek.

results.title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Spanish version]
results.creator_credit: Peter Lake and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: At a family picnic by a river, a father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Spanish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about pedestrians [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: The numerous hazards facing a pedestrian in a busy Australian city are pointed out. The importance of observing signals, crossing on pedestrian overpasses or crosswalks, and carefully watching traffic are emphasised. Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about her household [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Turkish.
